metadata.dc:author: Navalón, Pérez Cristina
metadata.dc:description: To carry out an adequate follow up during the days that an astomy patient is hospitalized will help a patient when he/she returns home. For that purpose, the author will focus not only on how to deal with a stoma, but also on the entire bio-psycho-social spheres of the affected patient.
metadata.dc:title: Paciente con ileostomía temporal de protección. Cuidados de enfermería.
[Patient having a protective temporary ileostomy].
